title: Demons & Upper Moons
description: How well do you know the Twelve Kizuki and other demons?

questions.question: Who is Upper Moon Two?
questions.explanation: Doma is Upper Moon Two, the leader of a cult who feeds on his followers. He killed Shinobu's sister Kanae!

questions.question: Akaza refuses to eat or kill women.
questions.explanation: Akaza has a personal code against harming women, stemming from his tragic human past and his love for his sick fianc√©e.

questions.question: What is special about Kokushibo (Upper Moon One)?

options.text: He was a former Demon Slayer and Hashira

questions.explanation: Kokushibo was Michikatsu Tsugikuni, a demon slayer and the twin brother of Yoriichi, the creator of Sun Breathing!

questions.question: Which Upper Moon demon can split into multiple bodies with different emotions?
questions.explanation: Hantengu (Upper Moon Four) splits into clones representing emotions: Sekido (anger), Karaku (pleasure), Aizetsu (sorrow), and Urogi (joy)!

questions.question: Daki and Gyutaro share the position of Upper Moon Six.
questions.explanation: The siblings Daki and Gyutaro share Upper Moon Six. Gyutaro is the true holder of the rank while Daki hosts his eye!

questions.question: Which demon killed Rengoku?
questions.explanation: Akaza (Upper Moon Three) killed Rengoku on the Mugen Train after a fierce battle, though Rengoku nearly killed him too!

questions.question: What is Tamayo?
questions.explanation: Tamayo is a demon doctor who broke free from Muzan's control and works to develop a cure for demonification!

questions.question: Lower Moon demons were all killed by Muzan because he was disappointed in them.
questions.explanation: After Rui (Lower Moon Five) was killed, Muzan summoned all Lower Moons and killed most of them for being too weak!
